item.title: How to make gambling machine
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

It will delete 500k cash, and then the server will choose a random number, either 1 2 or 3. if the number it randomly chooses is 1, it will give you 3m cash. If it isnt one, you lose the 500k cash and nothing happens.

item.title: How to make gambling machine
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

This shoudnt be too hard…simply make a void with a misc random, add the case of the object to go to that void.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2008, 06:13:26 pm[/size][hr]Here though…

Add this method:

public void gambling() { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 500000); if(misc.random(3) == 1) { addItem(995, 3000000); sendMessage("YOU WON THE LOTTERY!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has won the lottery!"; } }

That that does is that if you click the chest that has this void in it, it will delete 500k cash, then choose a number between 1, 2, or 3. If the number is 1, it will add 3M cash and yell that you won the lottery to every body.

Now for the case. Lets say ID of the chest we are using is 2380. Add this case:

case 2380: if (actionTimer ==0) { gambling(); } break;

and you are done.

Read full topic
